"You've done well to come here.": "I can lend you some advice if you're willing to listen."

"It even offers battle simulations using records from past encounters."
"While it's not quite the same as real battle experience, there is still merit in trying them."
"It would be best to see it for yourself. Head to the Quest Counter as a class you wish to gain experience in."
"I see. You are always welcome to come back should you change your mind."
"The Quest Counter allows you to experience past events, using data gathered from everyone's Mag."
"Your past experiences have been recorded in the ARKS History."
